title: Increase production if price is greater than MC

content.prompt: At the current production level of good X, price is greater than marginal cost. Which of the following actions would lead to greater efficiency?

choices.label: Maintaining the current level of production of good X
Imposing a tax on the production of good X
Imposing an effective price floor on good X

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
